anyOf.description: The date math expression string starts with an "anchor" date, which can be either now or a date string (in the format yyyy-MM-dd) ending with ||. It can be followed by a math expression, supporting + and -. The units supported are y (year), M (month), and w (week).
The date-time string is in ISO 8601 date-time format: 2019-01-01'T'00:00:00'Z'
The date string is in ISO 8601 date format: 2019-01-01

from.description: The starting value of the range.
